posts.post_content:
The card is SOLD. Thanks for looking.

Hi,

I have for sale a 1912 T207 Chief Bender Brown background card.  

It has a nice picture, with honest wear on the corners. There is some tobacco staining on the card. If that doesn't bother you, this is a pretty nice card.

Take a look for yourself.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t207/07-010.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t207/picsb/07-010t.jpg[/IMG]
Click on the picture to view a larger picture of the front and back.[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back. 
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board. 
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

An interesting fact about the Chief and me. 
Chief Bender died on the exact same day I was born.

Cy
can we see the back, where I assume the tobacco staining is?

Scott,

If you click on the picture, you can see a larger scan of both the front and the back.

Cy
